page.title: 16LEISURE
page.content: Leisure facilities exist in the area for both residents and the ever-increasing number of summer visitors. Residents spend their leisure in three areas: in the home, the village and the city of Norwich or the seaside twon of Gt.Yarmouth. HOME Of increasing popularity are video films and games to match the more long-standing pursuits of TV viewing, radio and record listening. Home computers are becoming increasingly common. {VILLAGE There are over 60 clubs and societies in the Stalham area:largely "self-help" rather than Local Government or commercially sponsored: Football, cricket, judo, tennis, darts,bowls, Labour and Conservative {
